ï»¿Every now and then, you come across a project that's really memorable...
One that stands out for me is by Katherine Newman.
The space is so creative, daring and so playful.
It has exuberant color, clever architecture, bold finishes...
Katherine really went all out here.
She worked with architect Peter Cebulak to design a family home...
...that has spacious rooms and plenty of natural light.
It's a fun place for the homeowners and their three children...
